title: Automobile production - automatic transmission forecast 2010 to 2015
summary: This statistic presents the Million of Automobile ( LoL ) monthly active transmissions worldwide from 2010 to 2015 .
In 2015 , LoL had 28.65 million Automobile , up from 25.36 million in 2011 .
Being one of the most prominent eSports games , in 2011 LoL championship finals attracted 36 million viewers worldwide .
